summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 2 October to end of Saturday 2 October GMT
description: Our weather continues to be dominated by an Atlantic low pressure system centered north west of the UK.<br/><br/>After a cloudy start to Saturday, wind and rain will develop, resulting in blustery wet conditions by evening. It's expected to settle down again into the night.<br/><br/>Good dispersion of any local emissions is forecast in a continuing fresh 'clean' Atlantic airflow. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
